instructions: Tap on the pen icon on the top toolbar (only available on mobile devices with a pen) You'll see that inking mode is on, and inking options show up in the contextual command bar.
Tap on the inking icon on the top toolbar Tap on the arrow next to Home for menu Tap on Draw to get inking options Tap on Draw with Mouse or Touch to draw on the document

When in Inking mode, tap on the Color icon to bring color options for the pen. From the color palette, tap on your preferred color. Tap on the Thickness icon to bring weight options for the pen. From the thickness options, tap on your preferred weight.
When in inking mode, tap on the Highlighter icon. In inking options, choose a preferred a color for highlighting. From the inking options, tap on Eraser to use pen/touch for erasing drawn objects.
